articles.description: Zak Crawley and Ollie Pope join Ben Duckett in making centuries as England dominate Zimbabwe at Trent Bridge.
articles.title: England vs Zimbabwe: Duckett, Crawley and Pope pile on runs at Trent Bridge

articles.description: Luke Shaw says the Manchester United squad must question whether they are "good enough" following defeat in the Europa League final.
articles.title: Luke Shaw questions Manchester United squad's quality after Europa League final loss

articles.description: Real Madrid captain Luka Modric reveals he will leave the Spanish giants after the end of their Club World Cup campaign this summer.
articles.title: Luka Modric to leave Real Madrid after Club World Cup

articles.description: Professional boxer Georgia O'Connor, who revealed earlier this year she had been diagnosed with cancer, dies aged 25.
articles.title: Boxing: Durham fighter Georgia O'Connor dies at the age of 25

articles.description: Bordeaux star Louis Bielle-Biarrey went from unremarkable teenage fly-half to the most prolific wing in world rugby in a handful of years
articles.title: Louis Bielle-Biarrey: Bordeaux star aimed at Northampton

articles.description: Reaction as Tottenham become Europa League champions, beating Manchester United 1-0 in Bilbao.
articles.title: Tottenham win Europa League: Reaction as Spurs beat Man Utd in final

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducanu could face three-time defending champion Iga Swiatek in the French Open second round as the draw is made in Paris.
articles.title: French Open 2025 draw: Emma Raducanu could face Iga Swiatek early, Jack Draper opens against Mattia Belluci

articles.description: Barcelona sporting director Deco says the club 'like' Manchester United forward Marcus Rashford and Liverpool winger Luis Diaz.
articles.title: Barcelona like Manchester United's Marcus Rashford and Liverpool's Luis Diaz, says Deco

articles.description: Olav Kooij wins a close-fought sprint on stage 12 of the Giro d'Italia as Isaac Del Toro retains the pink jersey in Viadana.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia: Olav Kooij wins stage 12

articles.description: Fourteen-year-old batter Vaibhav Suryavanshi has been named in India's Under-19s squad for this summer's multi-format tour of England.
articles.title: Vaibhav Suryavanshi, 14, in India Under-19 squad for England tour
